docs.summary: Let users create coupons that buyers can redeem on checkout

permissions.name: Manage Coupons
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix coupons.

params.name: specification
params.doc: Coupon meta data. ID is ignored and created by the server

Query for coupons with pagination and filters.
 Max 100 coupons will be returned per request.

docs.summary: Update a coupon (coupon type can't be changed).

permissions.name: Manage Coupons
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's Wix coupons.

params.name: fieldMask
params.doc: field mask of fields to update. Valid field masks are

params.name: specification
params.doc:
code,name,startTime,expirationTime,usageLimit,behavior,scopes,minimumSubtotal,active
 the coupon meta data to change. changing the type is not allowed

docs.summary: Update a coupon (coupon type can't be changed).

coupon type and information according to its type
 the coupon type is mandatory and must be passed on creation

members.name: name
members.doc: friendly name for display. up to 80 characters

members.name: startTime
members.doc: what time to start using this coupon. in milliseconds. mandatory

members.name: expirationTime
members.doc: when will this coupon expire. in milliseconds. optional

members.name: scopes
members.doc: if scopes is empty - the coupon is applied on the whole cart

members.name: perItem
members.doc: coupon is applied for each item in scope. the default is applied once

members.name: usageLimit
members.doc: what is the usage limit. if not supplied then it is unlimited by number

members.name: minimumSubtotal
members.doc:
if not passed - the default is active
 limit the coupon to carts which their subtotal is above this number

members.name: code
members.doc: the code by which the end user is applying the coupon. up to 20 characters. must be unique

members.name: active
members.doc: the coupon in active state. inactive coupon will be ignored when applied

members.name: freeShipping
members.doc: free shipping

members.name: percentOffRate
members.doc: discount by percentage rate

members.name: moneyOffAmount
members.doc: discount by amount

members.name: fixedPriceAmount
members.doc: the price of the

docs.summary:
Coupon represents all information available for a coupon
 including its basic definition and runtime information

members.name: expired
members.doc: is the coupon expired

members.name: usedCount
members.doc: how many times was this coupon used

members.name: specification
members.doc: the basic meta data of the coupon

members.name: createdTime
members.doc:
runtime information about the coupon
 creation time of the coupon in milliseconds since 1/1/1970

members.name: id
members.doc: the id of the coupon. should not be passed on creation

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

members.name: name
members.doc: Coupon scope's applied group (e.g., product or collection in Wix Stores)

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Item ID (when the coupon scope is limited to just one item)

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Scope namespace (Wix Stores, Wix Bookings, Wix Events)

members.name: group
members.doc: Coupon scope's applied group (e.g., event or ticket in Wix Events)

members.name: discountAmount
members.doc: the amount of the discount in case discount is given per line

members.name: afterDiscountAmount
members.doc: the amount of the line item after applying the discount

docs.summary: represents a single line in the cart

members.name: quantity
members.doc: the quantity of this line item. must be > 0

members.name: externalId
members.doc: the id of the item in the external system - usually will be product id

members.name: appliedDiscount
members.doc: after calculation - the applied discount on that line

members.name: scopes
members.doc: which coupon scopes does this line item allows

members.name: amount
members.doc: the amount of the line item (while quantity = 1)

members.name: lineId
members.doc: the id of the cart line item (could be 1,2,3) (mandatory)

members.name: subTotal
members.doc: cart subtotal

members.name: discount
members.doc: sum of all discounts

docs.summary:
represents the shipping line in the cart
 the coupons need to know about it because of the free shipping coupon

members.name: amount
members.doc: the shipping amount before applying the coupon

members.name: appliedDiscount
members.doc: after calculation - the discount on shipping

docs.summary:
Cart is passed to coupon service's apply function in order to
 apply the coupons calculation on it

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: array of line items of the cart

members.name: shipping
members.doc: the shipping line in the cart

members.name: totals
members.doc: summary of cart totals

docs.summary:
Coupon type and information
 . Coupon type is mandatory and must be passed on creation

members.name: name
members.doc: Friendly name for display (up to 80 characters)

members.name: startTime
members.doc: When the coupon becomes valid, in milliseconds (required)

members.name: expirationTime
members.doc: When the coupon expires, in milliseconds (optional)

members.name: limitedToOneItem
members.doc: True when the coupon is limited to one item

members.name: usageLimit
members.doc: Usage limit (optional)

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code the end user enters in order to apply the coupon (up to 20 characters)

members.name: ScopeOrMinSubtotal
members.doc: (if not passed - the default is active)

members.name: type
members.doc: the type of the coupon constant. read only field which is derived from the behavior

members.name: active
members.doc: True when the coupon is currently active

members.name: scope
members.doc: if specified - the coupon can be applied to only line items matching this applyTo

members.name: minimumSubtotal
members.doc:
the matching can be either exact equality or partial equality on the namespace / group
 Limit the coupon to carts with a subtotal above this number

members.name: freeShipping
members.doc: Free shipping

members.name: percentOffRate
members.doc: Discount as a percentage

members.name: moneyOffAmount
members.doc: Discount as a fixed amount

members.name: fixedPriceAmount
members.doc: Fixed sale price

members.name: url
members.doc: Media item URL

members.name: width
members.doc: Media item width

members.name: height
members.doc: Media item height

docs.summary:
Coupon represents all information available for a coupon
 including its basic definition and runtime information

members.name: numberOfUsages
members.doc: How many times this coupon has been used

members.name: expired
members.doc: Whether the coupon is expired

members.name: displayData
members.doc: Display information for coupon applyTo

members.name: specification
members.doc: the basic meta data of the coupon

members.name: id
members.doc: Coupon ID (should not be passed on creation)

members.name: dateCreated
members.doc: Time the coupon was created (UNIX Epoch time in milliseconds)

members.name: code
members.doc: error code

members.name: message
members.doc: descriptive error message

members.name: hasCoupons
members.doc: true if store has ever had a coupon

members.name: specification
members.doc: Coupon meta data. ID is ignored and created by the server

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the created coupon, if the call is successful

members.name: fieldMask
members.doc: field mask of fields to update. Valid field masks are

members.name: specification
members.doc:
code,name,startTime,expirationTime,usageLimit,behavior,scopes,minimumSubtotal,active
 the coupon meta data to change. changing the type is not allowed

members.name: id
members.doc: Coupon ID

members.name: coupon
members.doc: the returned coupon

members.name: coupons
members.doc: returned coupons

members.name: cart
members.doc: the cart with line items and shipping on which to applied the coupon

members.name: precision
members.doc: round the result to /precision/ places after the decimal dot. if not supplied - default to 2

members.name: currencySymbol
members.doc: the currency symbol for error message and applied coupon

members.name: code
members.doc: set code for calculating coupon by code (usually for apply coupon phase- for validation)

members.name: id
members.doc: set id for calculating coupon by id (usually for cart calculate phase)

members.name: discount
members.doc: kind of in memory discount that can be applied when coupon doesn't exist

members.name: name
members.doc: name of the coupon applied

members.name: code
members.doc: the coupon id which is used for the calculation

members.name: id
members.doc: the coupon id which is used for the calculation

members.name: cart
members.doc: the calculated cart which is returned after applying the coupon

members.name: appliedCoupon
members.doc: information about the applied coupon

members.name: error
members.doc: errors, in case call failed

members.name: id
members.doc: which coupon id

members.name: usedBy
members.doc: optional unique identifier in order for the increase usage to be idempotent

members.name: error
members.doc: errors, in case call failed

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of coupon to be deleted

members.name: paging
filter
members.doc: Filter string (e.g., when {"expired":"true"} expired coupons will be returned

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sort string

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load

members.name: offset
members.doc: Offset since the beginning of the collection
